alert.note: Alert for Fallon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 11:59PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN FALLON COUNTY THROUGH 1245 AM MDT... At 1158 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 19 miles west of Carlyle, or 19 miles northwest of Baker, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Frequent lightning, heavy rain and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ollie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is also occurring and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
